name: Cuculi Show The Game
description:
Megaman clone based on the youtube web series "Cuculi Show".

Help JP to find his way home while fighting his old friends. 

Controls
  • Enter to select
  • X to jump
  • Z to shoot
  • P to pause
  • Esc in the pause screen to exit
  • Controller support
Contact
  • Facebook
  • Twitter

Changelog v0.2.1

  • Solved an issue that could cause strange behavior after dying fighting a mini-boss.
  • Lightings from zone 2 should no longer appear after transition to zone 3 in Celesteman's Stage.
  • Added an animation to shoot on ladder.
